question: Dear respected brother, I wanted to know if I had to wear hijab infront of my momâ€™s uncle.
answer:
QUESTION
This is in clarification on my previous question. I know that I don't have to wear it infront of my own uncle. But what about my mom's uncles? Jazak Allahu khair brother!
ANSWER


Share:
Your mother's uncle (maternal or paternal) are your Mahrams as well. You do not have to observe Hijaab in front of them.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
